Module com.example.softmeth_project3
Package com.example.softmeth_project3

Class Date

java.lang.Object
com.example.softmeth_project3.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
Represents the month, day, and year values of a date. Includes methods to check if date is valid, format date, and getters and setters.
Author:
William Chen, Kalrav Pandit

  • Constructor Details

    • Date

      public Date()
      Default constructor. Initializes a new Date based on the current day, month, and year.

    • Date

      public Date(int growthFactor)
      Creates a new Date based on the current date, with months added on (up to a year).
      Parameters:
      growthFactor - the number of months to add

    • Date

      public Date(String date)
      Creates a new Date based on a string formatted as "MM/DD/YYYY".
      Parameters:
      date - a String formatted as "MM/DD/YYYY"

  • Method Details

    • formattedDate

      public String formattedDate()
      Formats the year in MM/DD/YYYY format.
      Returns:
      the year formatted as a String in MM/DD/YYYY format.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date date)
      Compares this date against another date passed through parameters. Compared by year, month, and day in that order.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      date - the object to be compared
      Returns:
      a value greater than 0 if this date is greater, less than 0 if this date is smaller, or 0 if dates are the same

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks if date is valid (has proper days and is a calendar month).
      Returns:
      the result; true if valid and false if invalid

    • setYear

      public void setYear(int newYear)
      Sets the year value to a new year based on user input.
      Parameters:
      newYear - the year to change the existing Date's year to.

    • getYear

      public int getYear()
      Getter for year value.
      Returns:
      the year value as an integer.
